 app.list
 app.delete exampleApp
 blueprint.list
 blueprint.delete exampleBP

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  mark.lavi@nutanix.com-2018-05-21-passphraseless
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
ssh_pwauth: True

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  mark.lavi@nutanix.com-2018-05-21-passphraseless
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
ssh_pwauth: True

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#echo hi
sudo yum install -y -q deltarpm
sudo yum -y -q update \
&& sudo yum -y -q install nginx \
&& sudo service nginx start

# sudo firewall-cmd --get-active-zones; --list-ports; --list-services
sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-service=http --permanent \
&& sudo firewall-cmd --reload \
&& sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --query-service=http

# /etc/firewalld/services/

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create
